text: Panos Papadopoulos (born 1958 in Athens, Greece) is the founder, designer and entrepreneur behind Panos Emporio AB, established 1986 in Gothenburg, Sweden, the largest swimwear supplier in Scandinavia. He is known as the bathing suit king. He is also well known as the man who desired to change the face of beauty competitions when he purchased the Miss Sweden contest and changed the name to New Miss Sweden. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * Miss Sweden website Category:Living people Category:Swedish fashion designers Category:1958 births Category:Greek emigrants to Sweden Category:People from Athens Category:Greek fashion designers
title: Panos Papadopoulos
